scripts.lerna-npm-publish: npm run-script dist-validate-env && lerna exec --concurrency=1 --parallel=false --no-private -- npm publish
scripts.rebuild: npm run-script purge-node-modules && lerna bootstrap && npm run-script lerna-run-compile
scripts.dist-prepare: npm run-script dist-clean && ./sbin/mgit reset --hard HEAD && ./sbin/mgit pull
scripts.dist-build: npm run-script purge-node-modules && lerna bootstrap && npm run-script lerna-run-compile && npm run-script lerna-run-dist
scripts.do-release-webapp: npm run-script dist-publish && lerna run --concurrency=1 --parallel=false dist-release
scripts.do-release-init: npm run-script dist-clean && npm run-script purge-node-modules && lerna bootstrap && npm run-script lerna-run-compile
scripts.dist-release-publish: npm run-script dist-prepare && npm run-script dist-build && npm run-script dist-publish
scripts.dist-release-webapp: npm run-script dist-release-publish && lerna run --concurrency=1 --parallel=false dist-release
scripts.dist-release-linux: npm run-script do-release-init && npm run-script do-release-linux
scripts.dist-release-win: npm run-script do-release-init && npm run-script do-release-win
scripts.dist-release-macos: npm run-script do-release-init && npm run-script do-release-macos
scripts.purge-node-modules: rm -rf node_modules && npx lerna exec --concurrency=1 --parallel=false -- rm -rf node_modules
